instruction: What is the most likely label for the metropolitan statistical area identifier over time, considering that the standardized deviation of housing affordability is less than 0.304123?

month.description: Date of the time series observation (format: YYYY-MM-DD, day always set to 01).

hpi_value.description: Nominal Housing Price Index (HPI) value for the given month.

hpi_yoy_pct_chg.description: Year-over-year percentage change in nominal HPI. Computed as: [HPI(t) / HPI(t-12)] - 1.

hpi_distance.description: The normalized distance of hpi_value from a long term linear trend. Units are in standard deviations from the mean

hpi_returns.description: Monthly return of the nominal HPI. Computed as: HPI(t) / HPI(t-1).

hpi_real.description: Real (inflation-adjusted) Housing Price Index, calculated by adjusting the nominal HPI for CPI-based inflation.

hpi_trend.description: Long-term linear trend in the nominal HPI.

afford_detrended.description: Normalized distance of the affordability metric (afford_pmt) relative to its long-term trend. Units are standard deviations.

afford_pmt.description: Affordability value, defined as the percentage of median household income needed to afford the median home payment on a 30-year fixed mortgage with 20% down.

acceleration_value.description: Monthly change in the velocity of the HPI. Represents second-order rate of change.

velocity_value.description: Smoothed year-over-year change in the nominal HPI.

risk.description: Model-derived probability that HPI will be lower in 12 months. Formally: P[HPI(t) < HPI(t+12)].

risk.description: Model-derived probability that HPI will be lower in 12 months. Formally: P[HPI(t) < HPI(t+12)].

velocity_value.description: Smoothed year-over-year change in the nominal HPI.

risk.description: Model-derived probability that HPI will be lower in 12 months. Formally: P[HPI(t) < HPI(t+12)].

instruction: What is the appropriate outcome for the details about where the tree is planted over time?

legal_status.description: Legal status of the tree, such as 'Permitted Site' or 'DPW Maintained'.

address.description: Street address where the tree is located.

site_order.description: Order of the tree at a given address (used when multiple trees exist at the same location).Trees are ordered in ascending address order

site_info.description: Description of the tree's exact location on site.

plant_type.description: Indicates whether the plant is a tree or other landscaping.

care_taker.description: Primary agency or individual responsible for the tree.

care_assistant.description: Secondary agency or individual assisting with tree care.

dbh.description: Diameter at breast height (DBH) of the tree trunk.

plot_size.description: Dimensions of the tree planting plot.

permit_notes.description: Reference to tree permit number or notes related to permitting.

x_coordinate.description: X coordinate in California State Plane Zone III projection.

y_coordinate.description: Y coordinate in California State Plane Zone III projection.

location.description: Formatted address or map location string for mapping purposes.

instruction: Determine the appropriate category for the tree location on the map as time progresses.

legal_status.description: Legal status of the tree, such as 'Permitted Site' or 'DPW Maintained'.

address.description: Street address where the tree is located.

site_order.description: Order of the tree at a given address (used when multiple trees exist at the same location).Trees are ordered in ascending address order

site_info.description: Description of the tree's exact location on site.

plant_type.description: Indicates whether the plant is a tree or other landscaping.

care_taker.description: Primary agency or individual responsible for the tree.

care_assistant.description: Secondary agency or individual assisting with tree care.

dbh.description: Diameter at breast height (DBH) of the tree trunk.

permit_notes.description: Reference to tree permit number or notes related to permitting.

y_coordinate.description: Y coordinate in California State Plane Zone III projection.

location.description: Formatted address or map location string for mapping purposes.

instruction: How are data points related if the child is not male and the location where the mother lived at the time of birth changes from Kansas to Hawaii?

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mothers state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mothers state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mothers state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

instruction: Predict the groupings based on input features if the father's race changes from greater than 38 to greater than 6 and the mother was not married at the time of birth.

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mothers state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mothers state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

instruction: What is the most likely label for the mother's birth state code if the father's age at the time of birth is greater than 83?

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 19782002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mothers state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.
